channel.title: Hi auto-updater help

item.title: Hi auto-updater help
item.dc:creator: @Cabby Cabby
item.description:
@Cabby wrote:

Did you get that from someone else?

I’m not really sure how you would use it but the

URL url = new URL(s1);

seems like the “s1” would be the URL to the files because that’s the update void.

Read full topic

item.title: Hi auto-updater help
item.dc:creator: @2killsami 2killsami
item.description:
@2killsami wrote:

Hello, i’m trying to add an autoupdater that updates client whenever i update on of the files…so you dont have to download the client all over again it just updates

i already have updater.java

[code]import java.io.*;
import java.net.URL;

public class Updater
{

private String curVer;
private String newVer;

public Updater(String s, String s1)
{
    curVer = s;
    newVer = s1;
}

public boolean needUpdate()
{
    return !curVer.equals(newVer);
}

public static void  update(String s, String s1)
{
    try
    {
        URL url = new URL(s1);
        File file = new File(s);
        InputStream inputstream = url.openStream();
        FileOutputStream fileoutputstream = new FileOutputStream(file);
        byte abyte0[] = new byte[500];
        for(int i = 0; (i = inputstream.read(abyte0)) != -1;)
        {
            fileoutputstream.write(abyte0, 0, i);
        }

        fileoutputstream.flush();
    }
    catch(Exception exception)
    {
        exception.printStackTrace();
    }
}

}
[/code]

so how can i use this

Read full topic
